name: Trident Books & Cafe
description: Rent this vibrant cafe space with large communal tables and inspiring vintage decor. Perfect for: writing workshops, book clubs, creative meetups, and collaborative work sessions. Includes WiFi, coffee service, and flexible seating arrangements.

name: George Howell Coffee
description: Rent this premium coffee space with minimalist design and quiet atmosphere. Perfect for: focused work sessions, client meetings, study groups, and professional networking. Includes premium coffee, WiFi, and noise-controlled environment.

name: Fenway Community Center
description: Rent this spacious community room with flexible seating and excellent acoustics. Perfect for: group discussions, workshops, community meetings, and educational presentations. Includes AV equipment, kitchen access, and customizable layout options.

name: JP Licks
description: Rent this cozy neighborhood cafe with local art displays and comfortable seating. Perfect for: casual meetups, small group discussions, creative brainstorming sessions, and intimate gatherings. Includes local coffee, WiFi, and welcoming atmosphere.

name: Cambridge Public Library
description: Rent private meeting rooms and quiet study areas in this modern library. Perfect for: educational workshops, tutoring sessions, research groups, and academic presentations. Includes WiFi, research resources, and noise-controlled environment.

name: Pao Arts Center
description: Rent this cultural arts center with gallery space and flexible seating arrangements. Perfect for: creative workshops, cultural events, art exhibitions, and community celebrations. Includes exhibition walls, AV equipment, and cultural programming support.

name: Le Petit Space
description: Rent this intimate French-inspired cafe with charming decor and perfect lighting. Perfect for: photography workshops, small art classes, intimate gatherings, and creative photo sessions. Includes natural lighting, artistic ambiance, and French cafe atmosphere.

name: Artists for Humanity EpiCenter
description: Rent this contemporary art space with high ceilings and abundant natural light. Perfect for: maker workshops, creative collaborations, art classes, and large-scale projects. Includes high ceilings, natural lighting, and flexible workspace configurations.

name: The Well Coffee House
description: Rent this community-focused coffee shop with large tables and welcoming atmosphere. Perfect for: study groups, networking events, team meetings, and community gatherings. Includes large tables, WiFi, coffee service, and community-oriented environment.

name: Brookline Booksmith
description: Rent this independent bookstore with cozy reading nooks and community event space. Perfect for: book clubs, literary discussions, author readings, and literary workshops. Includes curated book selection, cozy atmosphere, and literary community connections.

name: Somerville Community Center
description: Rent this large multipurpose room with kitchen facilities and flexible layout options. Perfect for: community events, workshops, cooking classes, and large group meetings. Includes full kitchen access, AV equipment, and customizable room configurations.

name: Blue Bottle Coffee
description: Rent this minimalist coffee shop with clean lines and excellent lighting. Perfect for: design-focused meetups, presentations, client meetings, and creative showcases. Includes premium coffee, WiFi, and professional atmosphere ideal for business events.
